title: Image
desc: Generate images with custom styles in Flux and ideaogram.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-800 to-gray-200 rounded-md border-transparent px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]

title: Video
desc: Generate videos eith Haluo and Pica, Runway Luma and more.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-yellow-700 to-yellow-500 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]

title: Realtime
desc: Realtime Ai rendering on a canvas. Instant feedback loops.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-500 to-blue-300 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]

title: Enhancer
desc: Lipscale and enhance images and videos uo to 22k.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-400 to-gray-900 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]

title: Edit
desc: Add attach change style, or expand portfolio and generations.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-purple-800 to-purple-300 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]

title: Video Lipsync
desc: Lip sync any video to any audio.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-green-800 to-green-400 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 ml-10 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[70px]

title: Motion Transfer
desc: Transfer motion to images and animals characters.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-900 to-gray-900 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2 text-white
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]

title: Train
desc: Teach krea to replicate your style products or characters.
iconClass: w-15 h-15 mr-1 bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-200 to-gray-300 rounded-md border-inherit px-2 py-2
buttonClass: md:py-2 px-4 my-6 text-gray-800 text-[10px] font-bold bg-gray-400 rounded-[25px] h-[30px] w-[90px]
